title: Mortenson Center in Engineering for Developing Communities Fund
description: To provide support for the programs and projects of the Mortenson Center in Engineering for Developing Communities at CU Boulder.   This includes research and development, service/outreach projects, and educational activities.
marketingContent: To provide support for the programs and projects of the Mortenson Center in Engineering for Developing Communities at CU Boulder.   This includes research and development, service/outreach projects, and educational activities.
